type: EPAC II Highway Maintenance and Repair
description: The contracting entity is seeking tenders for EPAC II highway maintenance and repair services. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to: maintenance and repair of highways, bridge maintenance, and any other related services.
tags: Employment and Social Development for Canadians
